site_title: Eight-Point Star by Dr. James M. Sakoda

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This 8-Pointed Origami Star by Dr. James M. Sakoda is folded out of only 1 piece of square paper. The pattern on this Eight Point Star is simply magnificent. It's perfect as a Christmas decoration. Enjoy! Eight-Point Origami Star timeline: 0:00 Demonstration 0:27 Diamond Base 1:46 Bird Base 3:45 Sink fold 5:15 Locking the Base 6:13 Folding the Points of the Star 7:45 Opening the Star 7:53 Forming the Shape of the Star 9:02 Reinforce the Star Shape 9:13 Open the Star to Complete Thanks For Watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art
